html: Good to see the figures today showing unemployment has dropped to 4% - the lowest in 40 years. A strong economy means more businesses in our towns, and I am delighted that there has been a 17.1% increase in businesses in Hastings and Rye since 2010.

html: My thoughts are with all those injured and affected by today’s attack in Westminster. I’ve seen first-hand the bravery and professionalism of our emergency services and I know it is second to none. I want to thank them for their swift response this morning.

text:
